title: FLOATING VILLA
shortDescription: A modern sustainable villa with stunning views in Dubai, UAE.
description: This 500 m² villa in Dubai, designed by our team, blends modern architecture with a focus on sustainability and spatial quality. The open-plan layout features floor-to-ceiling windows that maximize natural light and offer stunning views, while spacious living areas and bedrooms provide comfort and flexibility.

Greenery elements on the façade create a natural connection, enhancing both aesthetics and environmental performance. We've used sustainable materials and energy-efficient solutions to reduce the villa's footprint.

The villa's private swimming pool and landscaped gardens offer seamless indoor-outdoor living, ideal for Dubai's climate. Our design fosters a balanced, sustainable living environment with luxury and harmony.

title: Kakheti Alazani Valley
shortDescription: A luxurious beachfront residence with panoramic ocean views in Greece.
description: The architectural design of the house is located in Kakheti, within the Alazani Valley, a region characterized by its vast flat green landscapes and proximity to the Alazani River, which imbues the area with a distinctive sense of tranquility and connection to nature.

The building respects the natural beauty of its surroundings, incorporating local and modern materials, notably concrete, glass, and brick, to create a harmonious balance between the structure and its environment.

The house spans across a spacious plot of land, embracing the open views towards the valley. The design of the house reflects a seamless integration with the landscape, focusing on expansive, open interiors that foster a sense of freedom and connection to the outdoors.

With seven large bedrooms, the house is intended to accommodate big families, offering ample room for movement and relaxation. Each Living area is designed as a free-flowing, expansive space, allowing for both personal comfort and collective gathering, with large windows that provide an uninterrupted view of the lush greenery and river.
The open-plan layout is accentuated by the use of large glass panels, which allow natural light to flood the interior.
The living and dining areas are designed to flow naturally into the outside patio and garden, blurring the boundaries between the indoor and outdoor spaces.

On the upper floor, the bedrooms are strategically placed to take full advantage of the panoramic views. Each room is designed to evoke a sense of tranquility, with minimalistic furnishings that highlight the expansive volumes of space.
The materials, from the cool, smooth concrete surfaces to the warm brick accents, create a comforting, yet contemporary aesthetic that complements the serene landscape of the Alazani Valley.
